interfaces

Interface ScreensIF

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BookPageController, BookReviewsController, ClientController, EditReviewController, EditUserLibrarianController, HomepageLibrarianController, HomepageManagerController, HomepageUserController, MessagesController, PendingReviewsController, RegisterController, SearchBookController, SearchBookResultsController, SearchUserController, SearchUserResultsController, SearchWorkerController, SearchWorkerResultsController, UserPageController, WriteReviewController

    public interface ScreensIF
    This interface include similar behavior: every screen got back button, every screen got close button in every step. so we will impose that in the controllers.
    Author:
    nire
